apmon::BkThread

apmon::BkThread Class Reference

Separate thread which periodically checks the configuration file/URLs for changes and periodically sends datagrams with monitoring information. More...

Detailed Description

Separate thread which periodically checks the configuration file/URLs for changes and periodically sends datagrams with monitoring information.

Returns the system boot time in milliseconds since the Epoch.

Works only on Linux systems.

void apmon::BkThread::sendGeneralInfo (   )  [inline, package]
 

Sends an UDP datagram with general system monitoring information.

Only works with Linux systems; on other systems it is disabled.

void apmon::BkThread::sendJobInfo (   )  [inline, package]
 

void apmon::BkThread::sendOneJobInfo (  MonitoredJob  monJob  )  [inline, package]
 

Sends an UDP datagram with job monitoring information.

Works only in Linux system; on other systems it takes no action.
